derivation.yuyuan_name: from earlier cod 'scrotum' (from Old English codd 'bag, pod') + piece

entry.tran: (15、16世纪男子所用的)下体盖片，遮阴布
entry.def: A codpiece was a piece of material worn by men in the 15th and 16th centuries to cover their genitals.

means.word_mean: 1. (15th-16th century) a flap for the crotch of men's tight-fitting breeches
